p: AVC had a very low TAR and DO. Combined-intervention strategy that consists of LC and AVC had a similar TAR and DO as that of AVC. Combined-intervention strategy that consists of “rHBR 100%+AVC”, “rHBR 100%+LC”, “rHBR 100%+LC+AVC”, and “rHBR 100%+LC+AVC+Iso” had the same effectiveness (TAR, DO, AE, and RE) and had a similar epidemic curve as reported data ( Fig 3).
